#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long

int main()
{
ll n,row,i,j;
cin>>n;
for(row=0;row<n;row++)
{
for(j=1;j<=row;j++)
cout<<"-";

for(j=1;j<=2*(n-row);j++)
cout<<"*";

for(j=1;j<=row;j++)
cout<<"-";

cout<<"\n";
}


for(row=0;row<n-1;row++)
{
    for(j=1;j<=n-row-1;j++)
        cout<<"-";
    cout<<"*";
    for(j=1;j<=2*row;j++)
        cout<<"-";
    cout<<"*";
    for(j=1;j<=n-row-1;j++)
        cout<<"-";
        cout<<"\n";

}
for(j=1;j<=2*n;j++)
    cout<<"*";

return 0;

}
